Headline: Westbound #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute near 111th/Albany
ShortDescription: Westbound 112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted via 112th, Kedzie, 115th, Western, and 112th due to, street blockage near 111th/Albany.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted via 112th, Kedzie, 115th, Western, and 112th due to, street blockage near 111th/Albany.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
